div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1685 Mirgissa, near Wadi Haifa, Sudan, 1968-1969 Burial: mid 3rd cent. B.C. Contents: 36 AE. From excavations Ptolemy I: 23 Ptolemy II: 8 Ptolemy I or II: 5 Disposition: unknown Le Rider, RN 1969, pp. 28-33, illus. (presence of 2 AE of Cleopatra VII and 1 AE of Augustus regarded as fortuitous)
